relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented to person and place but confused; no acute distress.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Irregular rhythm, normal S1 and S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, distended, exquisitely tender to palpation in the right lower quadrant with rebound and guarding; minimal diffuse tenderness; palpable umbilical hernia in well-healed surgical incision without overlying skin changes.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, able to relay recent history, face is symmetric.
